column4: I just deleted a file using a gui does that automatically clear up the space on the hdd or do I have to empty some recycle bin?
depends if you put it in the trash or deleted it
yes, i'm wondering because quad and triple cores are coming out
well, youll see a drop when AMD releases the triplecore and another drop when Intel drops the price on its quadcore
now I want AMD and Intel to clash in a price war on the quads haha
ETA in an intel-quad-core price drop?
shrug its not like I have the money to even be looking at prices or timelines right now :)
I'm just wanting to see the ripple effect in the market and have dual core 64 x2 drop
The orange box (Valve) is coming out soon October 10th so i'm looking to gear up with an overhaul of CPU power
yeah but dont you need a new mobo and mem for that too?
yeah for most people that is an automatic must have upgrade
